extends Object
The ConversationsEngineStateMachine is a ChatBot-Framework to TODO: finish this
Author:
Marcel Engelmann

  • Constructor Details

    • ConversationsEngine

      public ConversationsEngine​(INLPComponent nlpComponent, int timeoutInSeconds, String jsonContextObject) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new ConversationsEngine object
      Parameters:
      nlpComponent - the NLPComponent that handles the user input
      timeoutInSeconds - the number of seconds after which the ConversationsEngine will transition into the sleepState. The timer refreshes after each interaction.
      jsonContextObject - the contextObject as JSON-String to start the ConversationsEngine with
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the INLPComponent is null or the timeout value is less than 1

    • ConversationsEngine

      public ConversationsEngine​(INLPComponent nlpComponent)
      Creates a new ConversationsEngine object with a default timeout of 300 seconds and an empty context object
      Parameters:
      nlpComponent - the NLPComponent that handles the user input

    • ConversationsEngine

      public ConversationsEngine​(INLPComponent nlpComponent, int timeoutInSeconds)
      Creates a new ConversationsEngine object with an empty context object
      Parameters:
      nlpComponent - the NLPComponent that handles the user input
      timeoutInSeconds - the number of seconds after which the ConversationsEngine will transition into the sleepState. The timer refreshes after each interaction.

    • ConversationsEngine

      public ConversationsEngine​(INLPComponent nlpComponent, String jsonContextObject)
      Creates a new ConversationsEngine object with a default timeout of 300 seconds
      Parameters:
      nlpComponent - the NLPComponent that handles the user input
      jsonContextObject - the contextObject as JSON-String to start the ConversationsEngine with

  • Method Details

    • getState

      public String getState()
      Returns the state machine's current state
      Returns:
      the state machine's current state

    • addSkill

      public void addSkill​(ISkill skill, String jsonStateMachine)
      Add a new Skill to the ConversationsEngine
      Parameters:
      skill - the skill to add to the ConversationsEngine
      jsonStateMachine - the skill's state machine in JSON-Format. For the JSON-Schema please check out the Schema.json file

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown​(Consumer<StringBuffer> operation)
      Shuts this ConversationsEngine object down and returns the current context object to the given operation
      Parameters:
      operation - the operation to call, with the context object passed as parameter, after shutting down.

    • userInput

      public List<String> userInput​(String input)
      Processes a new input and returns a List of answers
      Parameters:
      input - the input to process
      Returns:
      a List of answers
